item.description: RELEASE INFO: * Fix enable all positioning in mod management table(s) * Make more room for mods in collection mods area * Increase achievements icon size * Switch release for Linux from rar to zip (due to lack of availability of software which can properly open up rar files) CHANGES FROM v1.6: * Add chinese translation (thanks to Windmill-City) * Switch to custom noto font * UI readjusted due to new font * Add mod collection file hash verification (intended use case is for MP gameplay) * Add option to not close Irony after launching game (per game setting)
